Saxena et al. published a hospital based prospective study in acute stroke patients. authors concluded that in hospitalized stroke patients prolonged length of stay (>7 days) is related to low Glasgow coma scale scores and location of lesions and authors also found that the complications during hospitalization such as pressure-sores and sepsis are the main reasons for the prolonged stay in stroke patients [1]. In the research article, Niederstrasser et al. discussed the efficiency and s uitability of various therapies for individualized or group-based approaches, and their possibility for computerization in the treatment of dementia [2]. Weusten et al. reported attention deficit hyperactivity disorder in80- y ear old former veterinarian [3]. Chauhan et al. in their commentaryarticle discussed the role of personalized medicine and treatment in g eriatrics and hypertension in aged [4,5].
